### IR Contact:

Mike Ressler Flexsteel Industries, Inc. investors@flexsteel.com  563-585-8116

### Transfer Agent:

Computershare Trust Company, N.A. Shareholder correspondence should be mailed to: Computershare Trust Company, N.A. P.O. Box 505000 Louisville, KY 40233-5000

Telephone: Toll Free: 800-736-3001 International: 781-575-3100 Email: Web.queries@computershare.com
